summary: The module offers a set of helper utilities that streamline radiosity calculations within ANSYS MAPDL. It handles tasks such as optimizing radiosity parameters, decimating geometry for faster computation, managing surface definitions, and enforcing symmetry constraints to ensure accurate thermal radiation simulations.
business_intent: To empower engineers and analysts to efficiently set up and execute radiosity (thermal radiation) simulations, reducing manual preprocessing effort and improving simulation performance and accuracy in product design and analysis workflows.
